K12D0382_H0397:486b-22: dur khrod du bzhugs pas kyang sems can thams cad

K12D0382_H0397:486b-24: chos kyi sgo du mar rjes su 'khor zhing /
K12D0382_H0397:486b-25: lhan cag tu bcom ldan 'das 'khor bar bzhugs pa'o //
K12D0382_H0397:486b-26: brtan pa zhes bya ba ni gnas pa'i phyogs so //
K12D0382_H0397:486b-27: g-yo ba zhes bya ba 'di ni sems can gyi rgyud las gzung ste /
K12D0382_H0397:487a-2: ji ltar rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid de rnams
K12D0382_H0397:487a-3: nyid de gzhan dang rnam pa gcig pa'i ngo bos
K12D0382_H0397:487a-4: ste / de bzhin nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das /
K12D0382_H0397:487a-5: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rnams la bzhugs so //
K12D0382_H0397:487a-6: sems can nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de /
K12D0382_H0397:487a-7: dngos po'i don dam pa la gnas pas de bzhin gshegs pa zhes gsungs so //
K12D0382_H0397:487a-9: gang zhig sems can thams cad kyi sems brtan pa'i
K12D0382_H0397:487a-10: phyir sems dpa' zhes gsungs so; ;'dzin pa'i phyir ting
K12D0382_H0397:487a-11: nge 'dzin te / nges par 'byed pas rdo rje nyid du 'gyur ro //
K12D0382_H0397:487a-12: de'i phyir sems kho na g-yo ba nyid du gsungs shing phyi rol la sogs pas ma yin te /
K12D0382_H0397:487a-13: de rnams ni gcig dang du mas dngos po med pa'i phyir ro //
K12D0382_H0397:487a-14: thams cad ces bya ba ni ma lus pa'o //
K12D0382_H0397:487a-15: dngos po zhes bya ba ni gnas kyi don to //
K12D0382_H0397:487a-16: srid pa zhes bya ba ni skye ba'o //
K12D0382_H0397:487a-18: g-yo ba zhes bya ba ni brtan pa dang /
K12D0382_H0397:487a-20: dngos po dang thams cad 'di ni dngos po thams cad de /
K12D0382_H0397:487a-23: g-yo ba thams cad dngos po dang /
K12D0382_H0397:487a-26: g-yo ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni
K12D0382_H0397:487a-27: gang gi thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin
K12D0382_H0397:487b-0: g-yo ba'i dngos @487b po thams cad kyi bdag nyid can de /
K12D0382_H0397:487b-1: de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can gyis rdo rje 'di bka' stsal to //
K12D0382_H0397:487b-2: rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs kyi chos nyid kyis brtan pa dang /
K12D0382_H0397:487b-3: g-yo ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi bdag nyid de /
K12D0382_H0397:487b-4: 'di dag brjod par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa dang /
K12D0382_H0397:487b-5: me long lta bu la sogs pas bsdus par 'gyur ba rtag pa dang /
K12D0382_H0397:487b-6: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga po
K12D0382_H0397:487b-7: thams cad kyi phun sum tshogs pa bsdus par gyur
K12D0382_H0397:487b-8: pa'o // kun gyi sgras ni yongs su zhes bya bar bzung ngo //
K12D0382_H0397:487b-9: mnyam par sbyor ba ni 'du ba'o //
K12D0382_H0397:487b-12: thams cad kyi chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi bdag nyid du yin gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
K12D0382_H0397:487b-13: gang dang lhan cig ce na /
K12D0382_H0397:487b-14: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' dang ste /
K12D0382_H0397:487b-15: de dang yang dag pa'i rang gi ngo bos sprul pa la sogs pa'i yan lag dgu yis so //
K12D0382_H0397:487b-16: 'on kyang longs spyod rdzogs pa can du mdzad pa'i
K12D0382_H0397:487b-17: sku gcig gis thams cad nas de'i bdag nyid kyi
K12D0382_H0397:487b-18: chu dang / 'o ma lta bur 'ong ba yongs su 'dzin to //
K12D0382_H0397:487b-19: de nas dkyil 'khor chen po'i rnal 'byor gyis phyi dang /
K12D0382_H0397:487b-20: nang gi dngos po thams cad kyi nang du de
K12D0382_H0397:487b-21: kho na skad cig gis ji ltar sangs rgyas thams
K12D0382_H0397:487b-22: cad kyis mdzad pa ltar rtogs shing shes so //
K12D0382_H0397:487b-23: de bas na sangs rgyas thams cad dang /
K12D0382_H0397:488a-1: gzhan pa rnams kyi lhan cig yang dag par sbyor
K12D0382_H0397:488a-2: ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor
K12D0382_H0397:488a-3: ba'o // mnyam pa'i dus ni dbyer med pa'i dus te /
K12D0382_H0397:488a-4: sbyor ba'i gnas kyis thams cad kyis des sems tsam
K12D0382_H0397:488a-5: du snyoms par zhugs pas gcig tu gyur pa'i dngos
K12D0382_H0397:488a-6: pos phan tshun du bsdus pas dngos po thams cad
K12D0382_H0397:488a-7: kyi rang bzhin gyis thams cad du 'gro ba'i phyir
K12D0382_H0397:488a-8: sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba zhes
K12D0382_H0397:488a-9: gsungs so // de bas na sangs rgyas thams cad
K12D0382_H0397:488a-10: dang mnyam par sbyor bas ni phyogs bcu'i nam mkhar
K12D0382_H0397:488a-11: 'gro ba yang dag par mthong ba 'di ni sangs
K12D0382_H0397:488a-12: rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i mkha' 'gro
K12D0382_H0397:488a-13: gsungs so // mar gsungs so // dra ba'i sgras kyang sgyu ma'i rnam grangs su blta ste /
K12D0382_H0397:488a-14: shing la sogs pa rnams las sgyu ma'i rnam par
K12D0382_H0397:488a-15: sprul pa'i glang po che la sogs pa ltar mi
K12D0382_H0397:488a-16: bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
K12D0382_H0397:488a-17: las bud med kyis 'dul ba'i sems can mi spang
K12D0382_H0397:488a-18: pa'i phyir ro // dkar mo la sogs pa'i rdo
K12D0382_H0397:488a-19: rje lha mo'i gzugs la reg pa'i phyir 'di nyid
K12D0382_H0397:488a-20: gyur pas sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor
K12D0382_H0397:488a-21: ba'i sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid kyis gang zhig zag pa
K12D0382_H0397:488a-22: med pa'i bde bas yid zhi ba'i de bzhin gshegs
K12D0382_H0397:488b-0: de nas sdom pa'i sgras brjod par @488b bya ste /
K12D0382_H0397:488b-1: sam zhes bya ba ni bde ba'o //
K12D0382_H0397:488b-2: bar zhes bya ba ni khyad par du 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
K12D0382_H0397:488b-3: bud med kun ni gong du gsungs so //
K12D0382_H0397:488b-4: sgyu ma'ang ji skad du gsungs pa ste /
K12D0382_H0397:488b-5: sgyu mas sgyu ma'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba'i don to //
K12D0382_H0397:488b-6: de yang rang bzhin gyis grub ste sgrub pa rdzogs pa'o //
K12D0382_H0397:488b-7: ji ltar rang gi ngo bo yongs su gyur pa zhe na /
K12D0382_H0397:488b-8: rang rnams dang de rnams kyi gzugs can ni rang gi gzugs can te /
K12D0382_H0397:488b-16: lus kyi rnam par shes pa de rnams yongs su
K12D0382_H0397:488b-17: gyur pa ni rang gi ngo bo yongs su gyur
K12D0382_H0397:488b-18: pa'o // bdag med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgom pas me long lta bu dang /
K12D0382_H0397:488b-21: bya ba nan tan gyi rang bzhin la gnas nas ldog par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
K12D0382_H0397:488b-22: gang gi phyir rang gi ngo bo yongs su gyur
K12D0382_H0397:488b-23: pas bud med thams cad kyi sgyu ma'i rang bzhin
K12D0382_H0397:488b-25: de'i phyir rnyed pa kun gyi bde spro bas /
K12D0382_H0397:488b-29: sgyu ma ni sna tshogs sgyu ma ste /
K12D0382_H0397:488b-31: dbyibs sna tshogs pa las lha mo thams cad la sogs pa'i gzugs can no //
K12D0382_H0397:488b-32: de'i sna tshogs sgyu ma'i phyag rgya 'di bzung nas
K12D0382_H0397:488b-33: blo la bzhag par byas nas 'di skad bka' stsal
K12D0382_H0397:489a-0: pa / nam mkha' 'gro ma bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems @489a *//
K12D0382_H0397:489a-1: dpa' nyid kyi btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du son
K12D0382_H0397:489a-2: pa'i phyogs bcu'i nam mkha' gang zhig 'gro ba 'di
K12D0382_H0397:489a-3: ni sgyu ma sna tshogs kyi phyag rgya zhes bya
K12D0382_H0397:489a-4: ba'i don to // 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las
K12D0382_H0397:489a-5: 'das pa thams cad kyi bstan bcos kyi nang du
K12D0382_H0397:489a-6: rab tu grags pa mi gsal ba'i skad kyis rang
K12D0382_H0397:489a-7: gi brdar byas pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
K12D0382_H0397:489a-8: mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa 'di ni mdor bsdus nas gsungs pa yin no //
K12D0382_H0397:489a-9: gang gi phyir bud med thams cad ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje lha mo'o //
K12D0382_H0397:489a-10: 'khor bar byed pa'i kun gzhi rnam par shes pa
K12D0382_H0397:489a-11: la sogs pa rnam pa brgyad la gnas nas ldog
K12D0382_H0397:489a-12: pa'i mtshan nyid kyis me long lta bu dang /
K12D0382_H0397:489a-15: bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes kyi sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gyi grub pa'o //
K12D0382_H0397:489a-16: de'i me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa'i sna tshogs sgyu ma'i rang gi ngo bo ste /
K12D0382_H0397:489a-17: de rnams kyi sgyu mas nam mkhar 'gro ba'i bya ba de ni gzugs sna tshogs su gyur te /
K12D0382_H0397:489a-18: de'i phyir sna tshogs sgyu ma'i phyag rgya 'di ni mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya bar brjod par bya'o //
K12D0382_H0397:489a-19: kla klos de rnams kyi nam mkhar 'gro ma 'ba'
K12D0382_H0397:489a-20: zhig gis bya ba ni mkha' 'gro mar brjod pa
K12D0382_H0397:489a-22: nam mkha' kun tu spyod grub pa //
K12D0382_H0397:489a-23: mkhar 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags //
K12D0382_H0397:489b-0: kun las zhes bya ba ni phyogs @489b bcu'o //
K12D0382_H0397:489b-2: de'i phyag rgya ni sna tshogs phyag rgya ste /
K12D0382_H0397:489b-3: spyan la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'o //
K12D0382_H0397:489b-4: gzugs brnyan gyi rnal 'byor gyis sems can gyi khams
K12D0382_H0397:489b-5: la phyag rgyas 'debs pa'i phyir des na phyag rgya
K12D0382_H0397:489b-6: zhes brjod do // sna tshogs zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyi rang bzhin nam /
K12D0382_H0397:489b-7: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' thams cad dang /
K12D0382_H0397:489b-8: phyag rgya ni sna tshogs kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12D0382_H0397:489b-9: kun las sna tshogs sdom pa yi /
K12D0382_H0397:489b-10: zhes bya ba ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa ste
K12D0382_H0397:489b-11: bde ba'i mchog gis nam mkha' kun tu 'gro ba'i
K12D0382_H0397:489b-13: sangs rgyas skad dbyings zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas
K12D0382_H0397:489b-14: dpal rnam par snang mdzad la gnas nas mngon par
K12D0382_H0397:489b-15: ldog pa'i rgyu rnams ni de'i rang khams rnams te
K12D0382_H0397:489b-16: / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
K12D0382_H0397:489b-18: thugs kyi rang bzhin gyi khams rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi skad kyi dbyings kyi sgras brjod de /
K12D0382_H0397:489b-19: ji ltar dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la gnas na
K12D0382_H0397:489b-20: mngon par ldog pa'i rgyu rnams ni de'i rang bzhin
K12D0382_H0397:489b-22: mkha' 'gro ma'i sgras nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i rang bzhin du bstan to //
K12D0382_H0397:489b-23: de bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad dang /
K12D0382_H0397:489b-27: don yod grub pa'i khams rnams blta bar bya'o //
K12D0382_H0397:490a-0: sangs rgyas kun gyi mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems @490a *//
K12D0382_H0397:490a-1: dpa' la spyan la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i
K12D0382_H0397:490a-2: nam mkha' la 'gro ba thams cad rdo rje sems
K12D0382_H0397:490a-3: dpa'i bdag nyid kyi mkha' 'gro ma dang /
K12D0382_H0397:490a-4: de skad du dpal he ru ka la dkar mo
K12D0382_H0397:490a-5: la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i nam mkha' la
K12D0382_H0397:490a-6: 'gro ba thams cad he ru ka'i bdag nyid kyi
K12D0382_H0397:490a-8: de skad du bdag med ma'i rnal 'byor dang ldan
K12D0382_H0397:490a-9: pa la rdo rje ma la sogs pas yongs su
K12D0382_H0397:490a-10: bskor ba'i nam mkha' la 'gro ba thams cad bdag
K12D0382_H0397:490a-11: med ma'i bdag nyid kyi mkha' 'gro ma dang /
K12D0382_H0397:490a-12: de skad du ye shes dang ldan pa la rdo
K12D0382_H0397:490a-13: rje mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pas yongs su bskor
K12D0382_H0397:490a-14: ba'i nam mkha' la 'gro ba thams cad ye shes
K12D0382_H0397:490a-15: kyi bdag nyid can gyi mkha' 'gro ma dang /
K12D0382_H0397:490a-16: de ltar sgrol ma dang lhan cig padma can dang /
K12D0382_H0397:490a-19: de skad du rta mchog dang /
K12D0382_H0397:490a-20: de bzhin du 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba nyid dang /
K12D0382_H0397:490a-21: gzhan yang yid la 'dod pa'ang rigs kyi rab tu
K12D0382_H0397:490a-22: dbye bas phye ba la mkha' 'gro mas de bzhin
K12D0382_H0397:490a-23: du yongs su bskor ba nyid du brjod do //
K12D0382_H0397:490a-24: de skad du sangs rgyas kun gyi mkha' 'gro ma rnams bstan nas /
K12D0382_H0397:490a-25: sdom pa bshad par bya ba'i phyir bde ba zhes
K12D0382_H0397:490a-26: bya ba ni gang zhig bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo
K12D0382_H0397:490b-0: rje sems dpa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya @490b dang
K12D0382_H0397:490b-1: lhan cig mnyam par sbyor bas gang zhig shin tu
K12D0382_H0397:490b-2: bde ba dang ldan par skyed par byed do //
K12D0382_H0397:490b-4: mchog ni khyad par du 'phags pa ste /
K12D0382_H0397:490b-5: bde ba thams cad kyi thabs phul du byung ba'i phyir ro //
K12D0382_H0397:490b-6: de nyid kyi phyir sgyu ma thams cad kyi rab tu sbyor ba ste /
K12D0382_H0397:490b-8: rang sangs rgyas dang mnyam par sbyor bas ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
K12D0382_H0397:490b-9: sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha'
K12D0382_H0397:490b-10: 'gro ma'i dra ba'i rab tu sbyor ba nyid kyis
K12D0382_H0397:490b-11: gang zhig bde ba bskyed pa de nyid kyi phyir
K12D0382_H0397:490b-13: de'i phyir de'i rgyus gang zhig bde ba mchog khyad
K12D0382_H0397:490b-14: par du 'phags pa skyed par byed pa de nyan
K12D0382_H0397:490b-15: thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis yongs su mya
K12D0382_H0397:490b-16: ngan las 'das pa de'i rnam par dag pa sgyu
K12D0382_H0397:490b-17: ma lta bu'i chos rnams thams cad rtogs par snying
K12D0382_H0397:490b-19: stong min zhes bya ba ni khams gsum dang /
K12D0382_H0397:490b-20: 'dod pa kun tu spyod pa'i yang dag pa ma
K12D0382_H0397:490b-21: yin par kun brtags pa'i dngos po yin pa'i phyir
K12D0382_H0397:490b-22: der yang dag pa ma yin par kun brtags pa
K12D0382_H0397:490b-23: stong pa yin pas dngos po yin pa'i phyir ro
K12D0382_H0397:490b-24: // stong pa min pa'ang min zhes bya ba ni don dam par gzung ba dang /
K12D0382_H0397:490b-25: 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i dngos po med pa ste /
K12D0382_H0397:490b-26: gang gi ye shes kyis gzung ba dang /
K12D0382_H0397:491a-0: 'dzin pa'i dngos po med pa mngon sum du bya @491a *//
K12D0382_H0397:491a-1: pa ste de'i ye shes kyang rnam par rtog pa'i
K12D0382_H0397:491a-2: spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir dmigs par mi 'gyur
K12D0382_H0397:491a-3: te / de nyid kyi phyir de skad du yang
K12D0382_H0397:491a-4: dag pa'i ye shes kyi dbu mar rtogs par bya'o
K12D0382_H0397:491a-7: shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor pa /
K12D0382_H0397:491a-10: snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
K12D0382_H0397:491a-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi snying rje'i bdag nyid kyi dmigs pa ni snying rje'i rang bzhin te /
K12D0382_H0397:491a-12: de nas mdzes pa'i snying rje thabs zhes bya ba
K12D0382_H0397:491a-13: ni shin tu snying rje'ang mdzes pa'i snying rje ste
K12D0382_H0397:491a-14: / btang snyoms kyis dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje chen po'o //
K12D0382_H0397:491a-16: gang shin tu snying rje dang ldan pa'i thabs 'di
K12D0382_H0397:491a-17: ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang
K12D0382_H0397:491a-18: bzhin te / dpal rnam par snang mdzad do //
K12D0382_H0397:491a-20: chos dag byung zhes bya bar sbyor ro //
K12D0382_H0397:491a-21: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par yang dag gas la zhe na /
K12D0382_H0397:491a-22: shes rab ces bya ba ni chos rnams sgyu ma
K12D0382_H0397:491a-23: lta bur rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i rnam par
K12D0382_H0397:491a-25: de nyid bdag gi phun sum tshogs pa'o //
K12D0382_H0397:491a-26: pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ni son pa ston pa ste /
K12D0382_H0397:491a-27: shes rab pha rol phyin gsal ba /
K12D0382_H0397:491a-30: rnam rtog med par lhag mos pas zhes so //
K12D0382_H0397:491b-0: brtags par ni sngon du @491b bdag po'i nus pa las zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
K12D0382_H0397:491b-2: brtags pa kun gyis zhes bya ba ni gzugs la
K12D0382_H0397:491b-3: sogs pa rang dbang du sgyu ma lta bu'i ngo
K12D0382_H0397:491b-4: bo'o // ci'i mtshan nyid rnams las zhe na /
K12D0382_H0397:491b-5: rnam rtog med pa'i chos rnams la //
K12D0382_H0397:491b-6: sems can don ni yongs su brtags //
K12D0382_H0397:491b-7: zhes pa ni snying rje'i dbang gis sems can gyi
K12D0382_H0397:491b-8: don gyi don rgyur brtags pa'o; ;de brtags pas cir
K12D0382_H0397:491b-9: 'gyur zhe na / sgra brnyan lta bur mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba la /
K12D0382_H0397:491b-10: sgra brnyan zhes bya ba ni brag ca'i sgra'o //
K12D0382_H0397:491b-12: mnyam zhing mnyam par dbyangs kyi rjes su 'gro ba dang /
K12D0382_H0397:491b-13: sgra rnam par rtog pa'i ngo bo dang /
K12D0382_H0397:491b-14: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas de sgra
K12D0382_H0397:491b-15: brnyan lta bur mnyam zhing de de ltar gyur pas
K12D0382_H0397:491b-16: brtag go / de ci zhe na; de nas 'di ni chos ngag byung /
K12D0382_H0397:491b-17: zhes bya ba ni de nas de'i phyir chos las
K12D0382_H0397:491b-18: chos kyi don gyi nges pa'i tshig so sor snang
K12D0382_H0397:491b-19: ba so sor rig pa ni brtags pa'i ngo bo
K12D0382_H0397:491b-20: ste / de nyid phyir 'di ni dpal rnam par
K12D0382_H0397:491b-21: snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dam tshig gsum gsal bar
K12D0382_H0397:491b-22: ste / byed pa'o // ngag gi chos ni ngag gi dbyangs zhes bya ba'i don to //
K12D0382_H0397:491b-23: de de ltar gyur pa ni ngag 'byed pa ste /
K12D0382_H0397:491b-24: ngag gi 'di ni de'i de bzhin du brjod do //
K12D0382_H0397:491b-25: de yang dag pa ma yin pa las grub pa ni chos ngag las grub pa'i phyir ro //
K12D0382_H0397:492a-0: chen po de ni theg pa chen po @492a *//
K12D0382_H0397:492a-1: ste; byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa'o //
K12D0382_H0397:492a-2: chen po rnam pa bdun du sbyor ba'i phyir shes
K12D0382_H0397:492a-3: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i
K12D0382_H0397:492a-4: mdo sde dag tu grub bo //
K12D0382_H0397:492a-5: de'i phyir ches khyad par du 'phags pa rdo rje'i
K12D0382_H0397:492a-6: theg pa theg pa chen po ni skye ba 'dir
K12D0382_H0397:492a-7: sangs rgyas la sogs pa rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir
K12D0382_H0397:492a-8: de'i yon tan dam par gyur pa stobs dang /
K12D0382_H0397:492a-9: mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa ste /
K12D0382_H0397:492a-10: de rnams kyi tshogs ni rgyas pa ste /
K12D0382_H0397:492a-11: de rnams yon tan dam par gyur pas so //
K12D0382_H0397:492a-15: dam tshig gsum zhes bya ba ni sku dang /
K12D0382_H0397:492a-17: thugs kyi rang bzhin thams cad do //
K12D0382_H0397:492a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
K12D0382_H0397:492a-19: bstod pa ji lta bu zhe na /
K12D0382_H0397:492a-20: rnam par rtog pa med pa'i rnam par grol bas
K12D0382_H0397:492a-21: gzugs brnyan la sogs pa'i rig pas de bzhin gshegs
K12D0382_H0397:492a-22: pa thams cad kyis bstod do //
K12D0382_H0397:492a-23: gang gi phyir brtan pa dang /
K12D0382_H0397:492a-24: g-yo ba la sogs pa ma lus pa la stong
K12D0382_H0397:492a-25: pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis khyab cing brtan pa
K12D0382_H0397:492a-26: dang / g-yo ba la sogs pa des khyab pas khams gsum rnam par rig pa tsam ste /
K12D0382_H0397:492a-27: de'i phyir sdom pa la sogs pa rnams la lha'i rnal 'byor du gsungs so //
K12D0382_H0397:492b-1: gal te ci'i slad du de'i rang bzhin thams cad
K12D0382_H0397:492b-2: de'i rnam pas 'jig rten pas de rtogs par mi
K12D0382_H0397:492b-3: 'gyur ba lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0382_H0397:492b-4: gang gi phyir zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs so //
K12D0382_H0397:492b-5: thams cad bdag nyid ces bya ba ni thams cad kyi dngos pos so //
K12D0382_H0397:492b-6: bdag nyid kyi zhes bya ba ni rang gi'o //
K12D0382_H0397:492b-7: rnam shes phung por zhes bya ba ni gang zhig rnam par shes pa'i lus la'o //
K12D0382_H0397:492b-8: gnas pa ni rang rig pa'i sems kyi ngo bo ste /
K12D0382_H0397:492b-9: de'i phyir rmongs pa ni gti mug go /
K12D0382_H0397:492b-10: skyes bu tha ma ni rigs pa can la sogs pa'o //
K12D0382_H0397:492b-11: rtogs mi nus zhes bya ba ni rmongs pa dang bcas pas mi shes so //
K12D0382_H0397:492b-13: gal te de mi 'tshal na ji ltar de rnams kyi de kho na 'tshal ba lags //
K12D0382_H0397:492b-15: sems dang sems byung sems tshul bdag /
K12D0382_H0397:492b-16: ces bya ba ni sems can gyi sems kyi ngo bo'o //
K12D0382_H0397:492b-17: sems zhes bya ba ni thams cad du dngos po'i
K12D0382_H0397:492b-18: rang bzhin dge ba'i phung po la sogs pa rig
K12D0382_H0397:492b-19: par byed pa'i bdag nyid can gyi 'tsho ba'o //
K12D0382_H0397:492b-20: ye shes kyi bdag nyid ces bya ba ni thams cad du 'gro ba ste /
K12D0382_H0397:492b-21: de la khyab 'jug gi ye shes kyi bdag nyid
K12D0382_H0397:492b-22: skyes bu'o; ;shes bya'i rang bzhin can zhes bya ba
K12D0382_H0397:492b-28: rang gi ngo bo can dang /
K12D0382_H0397:493a-1: dbang phyug tu smra ba rnams ni chos rnams kyi byed par dbang phyug 'dod do zhes zer ro //
K12D0382_H0397:493a-2: chos can dngos po de nyid ces bya ba ni
K12D0382_H0397:493a-3: bdag nyid can de nyid grub pa'i mtha' las bsod
K12D0382_H0397:493a-4: nams la sogs pa'i chos rnams byed pa po'am /
K12D0382_H0397:493a-5: chos kyi ngo bor dbang phyug chen po 'dod de /
K12D0382_H0397:493a-6: de rab tu bstan pa'i don du 'dis rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog par gsungs pa dang /
K12D0382_H0397:493a-7: gcig dang du ma dag dang /
K12D0382_H0397:493a-8: bsgrub par bya ba dag dang /
K12D0382_H0397:493a-12: chos rnams kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /
K12D0382_H0397:493a-13: du mas zhes bya ba ni gal te du ma
K12D0382_H0397:493a-14: nyid bsgrub par bya ba'i rgyur brjod na du ma
K12D0382_H0397:493a-15: nyid mi skyed pa'i phyir ro //
K12D0382_H0397:493a-16: 'dis gcig pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir brjod pas chu bo dang /
K12D0382_H0397:493a-17: rgya mtsho'i gnas kyis gnyis kyi'ang dpe brjod do //
K12D0382_H0397:493a-18: 'dis gcig dang du ma dag gis sgrub pa'i phyir dper brjod par bya ste /
K12D0382_H0397:493a-19: re la re zhig du ma'i chos rnams kyi mthar
K12D0382_H0397:493a-20: brjod pa'i sems la sogs pa'i dngos po du ma
K12D0382_H0397:493a-22: gang gi phyir gcig las log pa rnam pa sna
K12D0382_H0397:493a-23: tshogs pa'i rim pa 'dis chos ni du mas ni
K12D0382_H0397:493a-24: zhes pa ni rgyus thams cad mu stegs pa'i sems
K12D0382_H0397:493a-25: la sogs pa'i rnam pa du mar 'dod do //
K12D0382_H0397:493b-3: chu bo'i rgyun ni zhes bya ba'i sgras ni nyan thos so //
K12D0382_H0397:493b-4: rgya mtsho zhes bya ba ni rol mtsho las phyi
K12D0382_H0397:493b-5: rol du ji lta bu chu bo sh'i ta dang;
K12D0382_H0397:493b-6: sindhu dang / gang g'a la sogs pa'i chu bo'i
K12D0382_H0397:493b-7: rgyun 'bab cing rab tu 'khor ba 'di ni sindhu'i
K12D0382_H0397:493b-8: sindhu dang / chu bo'o // 'di ni gang g'a'i
K12D0382_H0397:493b-9: chu bo zhes sna tshogs nyid du dmigs par mi
K12D0382_H0397:493b-10: 'gyur ro; ;de bzhin du zab cing gting dpag dka'
K12D0382_H0397:493b-11: ba'i chos kyi dbyings las phyi rol tu gyur pa'i
K12D0382_H0397:493b-12: mu stegs can rnams kyi bdag dang /
K12D0382_H0397:493b-15: gang zag ces bya ba sna tshogs nyid do //
K12D0382_H0397:493b-18: 'dir de kho na nyid du ma'i rnam pa nyid lags sam /
K12D0382_H0397:493b-21: gang zhig 'dir de kho na ni gcig tu mngon par 'dod de /
K12D0382_H0397:493b-22: de kho na nyid de'i ngo bo gcig par gsungs pa nyid do //
K12D0382_H0397:493b-24: mang po nyid do zhes bya ba la sogs pa
K12D0382_H0397:493b-25: las mang po nyid ces bya ba ni de rnams
K12D0382_H0397:493b-26: kyi sems la sogs pa gang zhig du ma rnam
K12D0382_H0397:493b-27: pa sna tshogs pa de ni dam pas dmigs par
K12D0382_H0397:493b-28: mi 'gyur zhing rigs pas rtogs par mi 'gyur ro
K12D0382_H0397:493b-29: // gang gi phyir du ma nyid ni gcig la 'jug pa ste /
K12D0382_H0397:493b-31: chu bo rnams kyi du ma nyid rgya mtshor 'jug pa ltar /
K12D0382_H0397:494a-0: bdag la sogs pa yod do zhes bya bar rigs pas rtogs @494a *//
K12D0382_H0397:494a-2: rigs pa yod pa dang lhan du zin kyang sems
K12D0382_H0397:494a-3: la sogs pa gang gi tshe chos thams cad bdag
K12D0382_H0397:494a-4: med par zhugs pa de'i tshe'ang /
K12D0382_H0397:494a-5: de rnams kyi sna tshogs nyid mi 'dod do //
K12D0382_H0397:494a-7: rgya mtsho la chu bo du ma nyid zhugs pa'i so sor snang ba'i dngos po med do //
K12D0382_H0397:494a-8: de bzhin du du ma nyid kyi dngos po med pa'i phyir /
K12D0382_H0397:494a-9: de kho na nyid gcig pa'i rnam pa nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
K12D0382_H0397:494a-10: de de lta bu'i rnam pas gang las de kho na nyid rnyed par 'gyur ba lags //
K12D0382_H0397:494a-12: bla ma'i zhal las zhes bya ba la bla ma ni sngags dang /
K12D0382_H0397:494a-15: gang zhig tshig gis man ngag rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0382_H0397:494a-16: de'i man ngag nges par bstan pa bka' stsal pa /
K12D0382_H0397:494a-17: nang gi zhes bya ba ni rtsa mdzes pa'i spyi
K12D0382_H0397:494a-18: bor ji lta bu'i gzugs kyis rnam par gnas pa
K12D0382_H0397:494a-19: dang / nam mkha' lnga yis brgyan par byas pa'o //
K12D0382_H0397:494a-20: gsang ba'i padma ni gsang ba'i gnas zhes gsungs te /
K12D0382_H0397:494a-21: padma'i lte bar rtsa mdzes pa'i spyi bo'i phyogs su khrag dang /
K12D0382_H0397:494a-23: gci ba 'dzin pa'i rtsa lnga yis mdzes pa'i phyir spyi bo'i nam mkha'i gnas su'o //
K12D0382_H0397:494a-30: gnyis kyis tsha ba'i mtshan nyid dang /
K12D0382_H0397:494a-31: 'dod chags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zhugs pas
K12D0382_H0397:494b-0: @494b nam mkha' lnga po 'di rnams kyi brgyan par
K12D0382_H0397:494b-1: byas pa ste / padma 'ba' zhig gis brgyan pa ni ma yin no zhes bka' stsal to //
K12D0382_H0397:494b-2: gsang ba zhes bya ba ni don rnam pa bdun te /
K12D0382_H0397:494b-3: brgyad pa ni brjod du med pa'i mtshan nyid do //
K12D0382_H0397:494b-4: gsang ba zhes bya ba ni mi gsal ba'o //
K12D0382_H0397:494b-5: der gsang ba de nyid phyogs yin te /
K12D0382_H0397:494b-6: de kho na nyid mdor bstan pa'o //
K12D0382_H0397:494b-7: gsang ba ni sa bon lnga'o //
K12D0382_H0397:494b-8: gsang ba ni dam pa'i dngos po sbas pa'o //
K12D0382_H0397:494b-9: gsang ba ni gsang ba'i padma'o //
K12D0382_H0397:494b-10: gsang ba ni lte ba'i dga' ba'o //
K12D0382_H0397:494b-11: gsang ba ni thams cad du 'gro bo'o //
K12D0382_H0397:494b-12: gsang ba ni bde ba thams cad mtha' yas pa ste //
K12D0382_H0397:494b-13: rgyud kyi gzhung gis bshad do //
K12D0382_H0397:494b-14: gsang ba yang ni byang chub sems //
K12D0382_H0397:494b-15: gnyis pa thabs dang shes rab nyid //
K12D0382_H0397:494b-16: gsum pa yang ni snying rje ste //
K12D0382_H0397:494b-17: bzhi pa snying po dam pa nyid //
K12D0382_H0397:494b-18: lnga pa mnyam pa nyid du gsungs //
K12D0382_H0397:494b-19: drug pa la ni byams pa nyid //
K12D0382_H0397:494b-20: bdun pa chos nyid ye shes te //
K12D0382_H0397:494b-21: 'di rnams gnas su kun tu bzhugs //
K12D0382_H0397:494b-22: byang chub sems ni ma skyes pa //
K12D0382_H0397:494b-23: ting 'dzin rnam pa sna tshogs mchog /
K12D0382_H0397:494b-24: ming ni mdzes phyir rnam par bshad //
K12D0382_H0397:494b-25: rdo rje sems dpa'i dga' ma de //
K12D0382_H0397:494b-26: mang po'i gnas su gcig pu ste //
K12D0382_H0397:494b-27: de ni shes rab pha rol phyin //
K12D0382_H0397:494b-28: kun mkhyen kun 'gro thams cad pa //
K12D0382_H0397:494b-30: sgyu ma'i gzugs brgya rig pa'i phyir //
K12D0382_H0397:494b-31: sangs rgyas kun gyis 'chad par byed //
K12D0382_H0397:495a-2: sngags ni lnga po yang dag bshad //
K12D0382_H0397:495a-3: shes rab pha rol phyin par gsungs //
K12D0382_H0397:495a-4: yi ge dang po gcig gyur pa //
K12D0382_H0397:495a-5: me long la sogs bder gshegs lnga //
K12D0382_H0397:495a-6: drug pa dpal ldan bde chen po //
K12D0382_H0397:495a-7: de yi yang ni ye shes gzhan //
K12D0382_H0397:495a-8: dag pa steng du grags pa med //
K12D0382_H0397:495a-9: rgyud ni 'bum phrag tshad du ni //
K12D0382_H0397:495a-10: drug pa yod par ma gsungs so //
K12D0382_H0397:495a-11: rdo rje sems dpa' lta bu nyid //
K12D0382_H0397:495a-12: mi yi 'jig rten yod ma yin //
K12D0382_H0397:495a-13: de phyir nga yis khyod la bshad //
K12D0382_H0397:495a-14: 'di nyid kyi ni nang son pas //
K12D0382_H0397:495a-15: gnyis med mnyam pa nyid du gang //
K12D0382_H0397:495a-16: sngon dang phyi mar bcom ldan 'das //
K12D0382_H0397:495a-17: dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs //
K12D0382_H0397:495a-18: 'di la slob dpon gyis thams cad du 'gro ba'i ye shes ji lta bu lags /
K12D0382_H0397:495a-19: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs /
K12D0382_H0397:495a-20: gnas ni rnam pa bzhi ru gsungs //
K12D0382_H0397:495a-21: bzhi ni cha dang yang dag ldan //
K12D0382_H0397:495a-22: padma bzhi la rnam par gnas //
K12D0382_H0397:495a-23: spyi bo med snying padmar gnas //
K12D0382_H0397:495a-24: kha yi padma'i spyi bor gnas //
K12D0382_H0397:495a-25: lte ba'i padmar gnas pa'i sgra //
K12D0382_H0397:495a-26: sgra mthar gsang ba'i padmar ni //
K12D0382_H0397:495a-28: thig le'i sbyor bas rab tu bskor //
K12D0382_H0397:495a-29: kha dog gnag dang dmar ba dang //
K12D0382_H0397:495a-30: mdog dkar de bzhin ser ba nyid //
K12D0382_H0397:495a-31: cha ni bcom ldan thig le'i gzugs //
K12D0382_H0397:495a-32: cha ni shes rab cha zhes gsungs //
K12D0382_H0397:495b-0: lha mo sgra ni rnam @495b nges bstan //
K12D0382_H0397:495b-1: gang de rig ma sgyu ma che //
K12D0382_H0397:495b-2: sna tshogs gzugs can mtha' yas ma //
K12D0382_H0397:495b-4: thig le'i sgra ni yongs su bskor //
K12D0382_H0397:495b-5: chos kyi phung po brgyad khri dang //
K12D0382_H0397:495b-6: bzhi stong gi ni cho gas ni //
K12D0382_H0397:495b-7: lus kyi de nyid mi shes pas //
K12D0382_H0397:495b-8: de dag thams cad 'bras bu med //
K12D0382_H0397:495b-9: yig 'bru rnams kyi dang po aa //
K12D0382_H0397:495b-10: brtan dang g-yo ba rnams la gnas //
K12D0382_H0397:495b-13: thog ma tha ma med pa'i lha //
K12D0382_H0397:495b-14: de yi spyi bo nges par bstan //
K12D0382_H0397:495b-15: mchog gi de nyid 'da dag ni //
K12D0382_H0397:495b-16: lha mo nga yis rab tu phye //
K12D0382_H0397:495b-18: chos kyi dbyings ni brum du brjod //
K12D0382_H0397:495b-19: skye gnas dbus su rnam par gnas //
K12D0382_H0397:495b-20: mthar ni sv'ah'a zhes bya'i phyir //
K12D0382_H0397:495b-21: bsdus nas zhes ni rnam par brjod //
K12D0382_H0397:495b-22: rus pa rkang dang khu ba nyid //
K12D0382_H0397:495b-23: pha las skyes pa gsum du gsungs //
K12D0382_H0397:495b-24: pags pa dang ni sha dang khrag /
K12D0382_H0397:495b-25: ma las skyes pa gsum du grags //
K12D0382_H0397:495b-26: 'di dag tsam du gsungs pa rnams //
K12D0382_H0397:495b-27: gong bu rnams ni bsdus pa nyid //
K12D0382_H0397:495b-28: gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang //
K12D0382_H0397:495b-29: 'du byed dang ni rnam shes nyid //
K12D0382_H0397:495b-30: sangs rgyas lnga yi gzugs brnyan dngos //
K12D0382_H0397:495b-31: phung po dag ces bsgrags par bya //
K12D0382_H0397:495b-32: gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ni //
K12D0382_H0397:495b-33: ro dang yang ni reg bya nyid //
K12D0382_H0397:495b-34: chos kyi khams zhes rnam par bshad //
K12D0382_H0397:495b-35: khams rnams dang ni skye mched rnams //
K12D0382_H0397:496a-1: rnams las ni byung ba yi //
K12D0382_H0397:496a-2: khu ba las ni gong bu skye //
K12D0382_H0397:496a-3: gong bu las ni mi rnams 'byung //
K12D0382_H0397:496a-4: yid ni nam mkha'i khams kun tu //
K12D0382_H0397:496a-5: skye mched dang ni khams rnams dang //
K12D0382_H0397:496a-6: dbang po phung po 'byung ba dang //
K12D0382_H0397:496a-7: khams rnams las ni byung ba yi //
K12D0382_H0397:496a-8: dkyil 'khor lus su gsungs pa ste //
K12D0382_H0397:496a-9: dkyil 'khor bha gar brjod pa nyid //
K12D0382_H0397:496a-10: dkyil 'khor yang ni byang chub sems //
K12D0382_H0397:496a-11: dkyil 'khor gsum ni brtag par bya //
K12D0382_H0397:496a-12: gang la gtso bo kun spyod pa //
K12D0382_H0397:496a-13: brtag pa du mar kun du gyur //
K12D0382_H0397:496a-14: phung po rnam pa gnyis su gsungs //
K12D0382_H0397:496a-15: 'byung ba rig par rtag tu brtag /
K12D0382_H0397:496a-16: myos byed dang ni lcags kyu nyid //
K12D0382_H0397:496a-17: zhags pa padma gzhug byed dang //
K12D0382_H0397:496a-18: bcing ba lcags sgrog dril bu yang //
K12D0382_H0397:496a-19: nges par byed pa ru ni gsungs //
K12D0382_H0397:496a-20: bshad pa dkar po zhes byar gsungs //
K12D0382_H0397:496a-21: padma zhes bya khrag tu gsungs //
K12D0382_H0397:496a-22: sha zhes bya ba mar me nyid //
K12D0382_H0397:496a-23: khu pa nam mkha' nyid du brjod //
K12D0382_H0397:496a-24: thim pa'i phyir na ling gar gsungs //
K12D0382_H0397:496a-25: me tog snyim pa bha gar brjod //
K12D0382_H0397:496a-26: glu ni langs pa nyid kyi glu //
K12D0382_H0397:496a-27: gar ni mnyam par sbyor ba nyid //
K12D0382_H0397:496a-28: ro ni shi bar brjod pa nyid //
K12D0382_H0397:496a-29: kha ni zhal dang bug pa nyid //
K12D0382_H0397:496a-30: snying po ro bsreg dur khrod do //
K12D0382_H0397:496a-31: me ni byin za gsal ba dang //
K12D0382_H0397:496a-33: gur ni gu gul du brjod pa'o //
K12D0382_H0397:496a-34: nag po'i 'byung po'i nyi ma ni //
K12D0382_H0397:496b-0: mar gyi ngo yi @496b bcu bzhi pa'o //
K12D0382_H0397:496b-1: gser shing ni da du ra'o //
K12D0382_H0397:496b-2: aa lam ka ni ldong ros so //
K12D0382_H0397:496b-3: ma ru lung ga sa bon gang ba'o //

K12D0382_H0397:501a-11: long bu'i nang du sbyar ba yin //
K12D0382_H0397:501a-12: gang zhig brtan par sbyar ba ni //
K12D0382_H0397:501a-13: mnyam pa'i rkang stabs gnas su gsungs //
K12D0382_H0397:501a-14: rkang pa'i sor mo phyir bzhag nas //
K12D0382_H0397:501a-15: pus mo gnyis ni bsrang ste g-yo //
K12D0382_H0397:501a-16: sor ni nyi shu rtsa drug tshad //
K12D0382_H0397:501a-17: gnas ni bee sha kha ru brjod //
K12D0382_H0397:501a-18: ngang pa'i gshog pa'i dbyibs su ni //
K12D0382_H0397:501a-19: pus mo gnyis ni mnyam sbyar ba //
K12D0382_H0397:501a-20: bar du yang ni khru gnyis nyid //
K12D0382_H0397:501a-21: de ni dkyil 'khor rkang thabs gsungs //
K12D0382_H0397:501a-22: gang yang gshol gyi dbyibs mnyam par //
K12D0382_H0397:501a-23: pus mo brla yi g-yas bsrungs na //
K12D0382_H0397:501a-24: g-yon ni byol song 'gro ba yin //
K12D0382_H0397:501a-25: 'khyud nas brla dang brang du gnas //
K12D0382_H0397:501a-26: mtho lnga rnam par rgyas par ni //
K12D0382_H0397:501a-27: g-yas brkyang bar ni de rab grags //
K12D0382_H0397:501a-28: de nyid rnam par bzlog pa ni //
K12D0382_H0397:501a-29: de ni g-yon brkyang ba ru brjod //
K12D0382_H0397:501a-30: lhod min pa dang mkhrang ba nyid //
K12D0382_H0397:501a-31: mnyen zhing yan lag brtan pa nyid //
K12D0382_H0397:501a-32: gang las skye mched rnam par dag /
K12D0382_H0397:501a-33: rang gi sku yi phyag rgya ches //
K12D0382_H0397:501b-0: rims kyi nad @501b dang dug gi nad //
K12D0382_H0397:501b-2: 'dis ni yan lag kun brgyan pa //
K12D0382_H0397:501b-3: thams cad du ni zil gyis gnon //
K12D0382_H0397:501b-4: gang ba'i skye mched kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12D0382_H0397:501b-6: shin tu mdzes pas gzhu nyid gzung //
K12D0382_H0397:501b-7: g-yas su rab tu bsgyur ba dang //
K12D0382_H0397:501b-9: mngon du lag pa mnyam byas nas //
K12D0382_H0397:501b-10: rgyab tu bkug nas rim par ni //
K12D0382_H0397:501b-11: gang zhig dal gyis dgug bya zhing //
K12D0382_H0397:501b-12: 'gro ba thams cad dgug par bya //
K12D0382_H0397:501b-13: thams cad dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o //
K12D0382_H0397:501b-14: rna ba'i skye mched dkyil 'khor du //
K12D0382_H0397:501b-15: bcug nas rim pa ji lta bar //
K12D0382_H0397:501b-16: aom ni ji srid rang 'dzin pa //
K12D0382_H0397:501b-17: ji srid dus su aom zlos 'gyur //
K12D0382_H0397:501b-18: de srid dus su gzung bar bya //
K12D0382_H0397:501b-20: rim pa ji ltar mnyam bkug nas; ;cho ga ji bzhin gzung bar bya //
K12D0382_H0397:501b-21: de la cung zad drang bya zhing //
K12D0382_H0397:501b-24: 'dzum zhing mig gis blta ba dang //
K12D0382_H0397:501b-25: 'ben la khu tshur gdab par bya //
K12D0382_H0397:501b-26: sta stangs khu tshur bcug nas ni //
K12D0382_H0397:501b-28: gzhu yis rnam par rgyal pa'i phyag rgya'o //
K12D0382_H0397:501b-29: gru bzhi rnon po zlum po dang //
K12D0382_H0397:501b-30: de bzhin mchog tu bskor ba nyid //
K12D0382_H0397:501b-31: gang du g-yas nas bskod bya zhing //
K12D0382_H0397:501b-33: rim pas mnan cing drag mnan pas //
K12D0382_H0397:502a-2: khams gsum rgyal po chen po dang //
K12D0382_H0397:502a-3: rgyal ba'i bde ba nye bar spyod //
K12D0382_H0397:502a-4: dad ldan 'jig rten gsum rgyal ni //
K12D0382_H0397:502a-5: phyag rgya bcug cing mnyam bcug dang //
K12D0382_H0397:502a-6: de bzhin glog ltar bcug pa nyid //
K12D0382_H0397:502a-7: phyag rgya bkug pa'i ting 'dzin gyis //
K12D0382_H0397:502a-8: de bzhin glog ltar bskor ba nyid //
K12D0382_H0397:502a-9: 'og tu mnyam pa de bzhin du //
K12D0382_H0397:502a-10: steng gi phyogs su 'gro ba nyid //
K12D0382_H0397:502a-11: de bzhin gshegs 'dzin phyag rgya ni //
K12D0382_H0397:502a-12: gnas gsum dag tu bsgom par bya //
K12D0382_H0397:502a-13: rgyan thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12D0382_H0397:502a-14: kun tu kun nas thams cad dang //
K12D0382_H0397:502a-15: rnam kun dus kun rang gi ni //
K12D0382_H0397:502a-16: gzhu yi rig byed phyag rgya 'dzin //
K12D0382_H0397:502a-18: mtshon cha thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12D0382_H0397:502a-19: sangs rgyas rdo rje zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad de /
K12D0382_H0397:502a-20: spyan gyi gzugs su gyur pa dang /
K12D0382_H0397:502a-21: rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor dang ldan pas sngags kyi yi ge las spyan phyung ste /
K12D0382_H0397:502a-23: bum pa'i lag pa ma'i ma mo 'dod par bya ba dang /
K12D0382_H0397:502a-24: dbang bskur bar bsams na zhi ba skyed par byed pa yin te /
K12D0382_H0397:502a-25: shi ba rnams la srog sbyin par byed cing grub
K12D0382_H0397:502a-26: par 'dod pa la dngos po sbyin par byed do
K12D0382_H0397:502a-27: // rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la
K12D0382_H0397:502a-28: rdo rje'i dam tshig la skul bar byed pa ni
K12D0382_H0397:502a-29: rdo rje'i dam tshig skul bar byed pa'o //
K12D0382_H0397:502b-0: thugs kyi rdo @502b rje'i sku gsum 'bar ba'i mchog
K12D0382_H0397:502b-1: gi dam tshig ni m'a ma ki'i mtshan nyid de
K12D0382_H0397:502b-2: / gang du ting nge 'dzin la de ni de bzhin du brjod do //
K12D0382_H0397:502b-3: rdo rje'i rigs kyi sngags kyi yi ge dkar po
K12D0382_H0397:502b-4: phyung nas; de'i tshe bsgrub bya'i lus la gang bar
K12D0382_H0397:502b-5: bsgom par byas na sdig pa 'jig par byed pa
K12D0382_H0397:502b-6: yin no // zhi ba la ma mo spyan dang ldan pa lta bur bya ba dang /
K12D0382_H0397:502b-7: rgyas pa la ni rin po che'i bum pa nas
K12D0382_H0397:502b-8: rin po che'i char ba 'byin par bsam par bya'o
K12D0382_H0397:502b-9: // 'dod chags chen po la 'od dpag tu med
K12D0382_H0397:502b-10: pa'i gang gi padmas gtses pa de'i gar gyis phye
K12D0382_H0397:502b-11: // ba ste / de ltar gyur pa'i kun byed pa ni rigs kun gyi bdag po nyid can /
K12D0382_H0397:502b-12: gang gi kun byed pa ni thams cad do //
K12D0382_H0397:502b-13: 'dis ni byas pa de'i dmigs pas ting nge 'dzin
K12D0382_H0397:502b-14: la rdo rje dmigs par de bzhin du brjod do
K12D0382_H0397:502b-15: // rdo rje ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
K12D0382_H0397:502b-16: padma ni 'od dpag tu med pa ste /
K12D0382_H0397:502b-17: sngags kyi yi ge gser gyi kha dog lta bu
K12D0382_H0397:502b-18: phyung nas sgrub po la mngon par dbang bskur byed
K12D0382_H0397:502b-19: na rgyal po chen po skyed par byed do //
K12D0382_H0397:502b-20: de rnams kyi spro ba dang bsdu bar byed pa
K12D0382_H0397:502b-21: dag sgom par byed na chos kyi mdzod 'phel bar
K12D0382_H0397:502b-22: byed do // rang gi snying ga'i padma'i snying por
K12D0382_H0397:502b-23: nang du gnas par bsgrub bya sngags kyi yi ge'i
K12D0382_H0397:502b-24: phreng bas byin gyis brlabs te /
K12D0382_H0397:502b-25: sna tshogs rdo rjes spyi bor byas nas ji lta
K12D0382_H0397:502b-26: ba bzhin du snyoms par 'jug par byed na srung
K12D0382_H0397:503a-2: thams cad dbang du gyur pas rnam par rtog pa med pa dang /
K12D0382_H0397:503a-3: dbang du gyur pa la sogs de rnams rtog par byed pa dang /
K12D0382_H0397:503a-4: skyed par byed pa de ni don yod rdo rje can te /
K12D0382_H0397:503a-5: de nyid rdo rje gsung mnyam pa nyid kyis dga' bar byed pa'o //
K12D0382_H0397:503a-6: rdo rje ni mi phyed pa ste /
K12D0382_H0397:503a-7: gang du ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pas sngags kyi yi ge dmar po phyug ste /
K12D0382_H0397:503a-8: des bsgrub par bya ba dag par bya zhing bzlas pa byed na mngag gzhug par byed do //
K12D0382_H0397:503a-9: ye shes kyis kun sgrol bas sgrol ma zhas bya
K12D0382_H0397:503a-10: ba ni ye shes 'jug par byed ma can no
K12D0382_H0397:503a-11: // de'i tshe dmigs pa'i phyir de de bzhin du gsungs so //
K12D0382_H0397:503a-12: ye shes sna tshogs ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes sna tshogs te /
K12D0382_H0397:503a-13: rdo rje gshin rje mthar byed la sogs pa'i khro
K12D0382_H0397:503a-14: bo rnams de dag nyid kyis gdug pa rnams 'dul
K12D0382_H0397:503a-16: de rnams ni gur nyid do //
K12D0382_H0397:503a-17: mdzes pa ni yan lag dang /
K12D0382_H0397:503a-18: nying lag dman pa ma yin pa'o //
K12D0382_H0397:503a-19: srubs med pa ni dum bu gcig pa'o //
K12D0382_H0397:503a-20: srubs gnyis pa ni dum bu gnyis pa ste /
K12D0382_H0397:503a-21: 'di dag nyid kyi skabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
K12D0382_H0397:503a-22: rkang pa'i rjes kyi rdul gyi cho ga zhes bya ba ni de brjod pa yin te /
K12D0382_H0397:503a-23: gshin rje mthar byed kyi rnal 'byor pa lha mo bzhi'i rnal 'byor dang ldan zhing /
K12D0382_H0397:503b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa lngas byin gyis @503b brlabs pas
K12D0382_H0397:503b-1: bsgrub par bya ba'i rkang rjes kyi rdul gyis de'i
K12D0382_H0397:503b-2: gzugs brnyan byas nas thod pa'i nang du gzhug par
K12D0382_H0397:503b-3: bya ste / de nyid la gzhug pa dang /
K12D0382_H0397:503b-4: bcing pa byas nas rkang pa g-yon pas de mnan te /
K12D0382_H0397:503b-5: ji srid khugs par gyur pa de srid du bskul ba dang bcas par bzla bar bya'o //
K12D0382_H0397:503b-6: sku gsum mi phyed sgom pa yis /
K12D0382_H0397:503b-7: zhes bya bas ni rang gi lha'i nga rgyal brtan pas bsgoms pas so //
K12D0382_H0397:503b-8: gti mug chen po'i mchog ni don yod rdo rje can te /
K12D0382_H0397:503b-9: de'i ye shes ni rdo rje rtse mo las skyes pa'i byang chub kyi sems te /
K12D0382_H0397:503b-10: de'i phyir bdud rtsi'i khro bo ni gang du ting nge 'dzin la de de bzhin du brjod do //
K12D0382_H0397:503b-11: tshogs kyi bdag por rkang par bcug pa zhes bya
K12D0382_H0397:503b-12: ba ni bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi rnal 'byor dang
K12D0382_H0397:503b-13: ldan pas bsgrub par bya ba'i rkang rjes kyi rdul
K12D0382_H0397:503b-14: de'i gzugs brnyan bong bu'i gcin gyis byas nas mi
K12D0382_H0397:503b-15: dge ba'i phyag rgya byas nas rlung gi dkyil 'khor
K12D0382_H0397:503b-16: gyi 'dab ma las s'a lu btags par byas pa
K12D0382_H0397:503b-17: dang / dur khrod kyi sol bas bsgrub bya'i ming
K12D0382_H0397:503b-18: khro bo'i nang du chud par mngon par bris shing
K12D0382_H0397:503b-19: gzugs brnyan lnga rgyab tu bzhag nas rdo rje log
K12D0382_H0397:503b-20: par 'dren pa bkug nas mchod de /
K12D0382_H0397:503b-21: de'i rkang pa dag tu gzhug par bya'o //
K12D0382_H0397:503b-22: de bya'o zhes bya ba ni de srid du sngags kyi mthar h'um brjod par bya'o //
K12D0382_H0397:504a-0: gang gi tshe rlung gis bar chad du gyur pa de'i tshe gong du gsungs @504a *//
K12D0382_H0397:504a-1: pa'i rim pas stong pa nyid dmigs nas bdag nyid
K12D0382_H0397:504a-2: dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs su bskyed pa
K12D0382_H0397:504a-3: bka' stsal pa / rlung gis phyogs su dri nag
K12D0382_H0397:504a-4: pos dkyil 'khor gru bzhi bar thig le bdun ya
K12D0382_H0397:504a-5: yig so so'i nang du byas pa ni de'i dbus
K12D0382_H0397:504a-6: su thig le bdun po ste /
K12D0382_H0397:504a-7: thig le bdun po 'di rnams las rlung lha bdun ri dvags las zhon zhing mdog nag pa'o //
K12D0382_H0397:504a-8: de la rang gi sa bon las byung ba ni des rang gi snying ga las bton pa ste //
K12D0382_H0397:504a-10: 'dod pa'i rgyal pos bkug nas zhags pas bcing bar bsam par bya'o //
K12D0382_H0397:504a-11: de nas kham phor gyis zhes bya ba ni h'um
K12D0382_H0397:504a-12: sum h'um zhes bya ba las ri rab kyi gzugs
K12D0382_H0397:504a-13: rva brgyad dang ldan pa bskyed nas /
K12D0382_H0397:504a-14: kha 'og tu phug nas bzhag pa ni rdo rje 'ching ba chen po yin no //
K12D0382_H0397:504a-15: rang gi sngags bzlas pa ni de'i thig le bdun sngags kyis sbas nas dbugs kyis gnas par bya'o //
K12D0382_H0397:504a-16: de'i steng du'ang lam gyis dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa kha dog ser po'o //
K12D0382_H0397:504a-17: der yang rtse lnga pa chen po las mtha' yas
K12D0382_H0397:504a-18: pa'i 'od zer las khro bo 'jigs pa spro bar
K12D0382_H0397:504a-19: bya zhing / khro bo rdo rjes mnan par bsgom par bya'o //
K12D0382_H0397:504a-20: de'i steng du rkang pa g-yon pa bzhag nas /
K12D0382_H0397:504a-21: 'phags pa mi g-yo mgon gyi sngags brgya rtsa brgyad du bzla bar bya'o //
K12D0382_H0397:504b-0: rdo rje'i steng du bcom ldan 'das @504b rnam par snang mdzad dang /
K12D0382_H0397:504b-1: 'phags pa mi g-yo mgon zhabs g-yas brkyang bas thams
K12D0382_H0397:504b-2: cad gnon cing bcom ldan 'das kyi mngon du lag
K12D0382_H0397:504b-4: zhags pas rlung bsdigs par bsam par bya ste /
K12D0382_H0397:504b-5: de skad du 'jigs pa'i dus kyi rlung thams cad kyang bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro //
K12D0382_H0397:504b-6: char 'bab pa'i don du stobs po che zhes bya
K12D0382_H0397:504b-7: ba la sogs pa ni padma 'dab ma brgyad pa
K12D0382_H0397:504b-8: bris nas de'i 'dab ma brgyad la mtha' yas dang
K12D0382_H0397:504b-15: padma zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyi rim pa las ser po dang /
K12D0382_H0397:504b-16: dkar po gnyis sha sha sa h'a svam sv'a sam
K12D0382_H0397:504b-17: sva rang gi sa bon gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i
K12D0382_H0397:504b-18: klu brgyad po rnams snying po brgyad kyi nang du
K12D0382_H0397:504b-19: gnas pa'i rnga ma la bkug nas mchod de /
K12D0382_H0397:504b-20: 'di bzhugs pa'i khro bo'i tshogs sku 'bar ba'i tshogs
K12D0382_H0397:504b-21: kyi bdag nyid h'um ni h'um zhes mchog tu bzlas
K12D0382_H0397:504b-22: pas zhabs kyi 'og tu klu rnams gzir bar sgom
K12D0382_H0397:504b-23: par byed na char mchog tu rab tu 'bebs par
K12D0382_H0397:504b-24: 'gyur ro // char bzlog pa'i don bka' stsal pa /
K12D0382_H0397:504b-25: bdag nyid khro bo'i gzugs nyi ma'i mdog gi 'od
K12D0382_H0397:504b-26: ltar shin tu dmar ba bsams nas rang gi kha
K12D0382_H0397:504b-27: ru h'um 'bar ba'i lce nam mkha'i tshad 'dis dral
K12D0382_H0397:504b-28: zhing yongs su gang ba las sprin snying ga'i sbubs
K12D0382_H0397:505a-1: dbugs phyin pas ras bal gyis bur ma ltar gtor bar byed do //
K12D0382_H0397:505a-2: yang na rang gi phyag rgya'i tshogs 'bar bar bton
K12D0382_H0397:505a-3: pas dral zhing bcad nas h'um gis mchog tu bsdigs
K12D0382_H0397:505a-4: par bya'o // de gzhig pa'i don bka' stsal pa /
K12D0382_H0397:505a-5: me'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni
K12D0382_H0397:505a-6: rtag pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas rang gi dpral
K12D0382_H0397:505a-7: ba nas 'phags pa mi g-yo mgon ram las byung
K12D0382_H0397:505a-8: ba bton nas me la gnas pa phyag drug pa
K12D0382_H0397:505a-9: g-yon kshim las sdigs mdzub dang /
K12D0382_H0397:505a-10: zhags pa h'um gi nang du bcug pa dang /
K12D0382_H0397:505a-12: g-yas pa na kham las ral gri dang /
K12D0382_H0397:505a-14: h'um gis rdo rje 'dzin par bsams nas /
K12D0382_H0397:505a-15: de nyid kyi 'od zer gyi khro bo dang lhan
K12D0382_H0397:505a-16: cig pas bgegs thams cad h'um gi sgra bsgrags pas
K12D0382_H0397:505a-17: 'bar ba'i ral gri la sogs pas bsnun pa la
K12D0382_H0397:505a-18: sogs pa dang / mda' 'phangs pas phigs pas skyes pa'i bgegs gzhom par bya'o //
K12D0382_H0397:505a-19: skyes pa'i khrag chen po la sogs pa ni rkang rjes kyi rdul dang /
K12D0382_H0397:505a-20: skyes pa'i khrag gis bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan byas nas /
K12D0382_H0397:505a-21: skyes pa'i rus pa'i phur bu dag la 'od zer can gyi sngags nyi shus mngon par bsngags te /
K12D0382_H0397:505a-22: mig la phur bas btab nas tshogs kyi bdag po'i khar gzhug go /
K12D0382_H0397:505a-23: aom sumbha rdo rje gtun shing dang tho bas dang po kha dang /
K12D0382_H0397:505b-0: gtun shing gis rgyab @505b tu brdung bar bsam par bya'o //
K12D0382_H0397:505b-1: 'bar ba gzhom pa'i don du ming /
K12D0382_H0397:505b-2: sman gyi kha dog ces bya ba la sogs pas
K12D0382_H0397:505b-3: ni nam mkha'i gnas su h'um ga:h'um zhes nang du
K12D0382_H0397:505b-4: gzhug par bya'o // phu:'i yig 'bru las skyes ba
K12D0382_H0397:505b-5: klu nag po stong phrag gis bskor ba'i nam mkha'
K12D0382_H0397:505b-6: lding gis bka' stsal par bya'o //
K12D0382_H0397:505b-7: ji lta ba bzhin du bsgoms te /
K12D0382_H0397:505b-8: aom badzra n'a ra ye na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dang bor bskul te /
K12D0382_H0397:505b-9: des brgya byin yang bskul bar bya'o //
K12D0382_H0397:505b-10: 'di yang de char gyi sprin la char gyi don du bka' stsal bar bya ste /
K12D0382_H0397:505b-11: bka' thos na yang char 'bebs pas sprin phyir bzlog
K12D0382_H0397:505b-12: pa ni yid kyis bsam par byed na nam mkha'
K12D0382_H0397:505b-13: lding gi gshog pas zlog par byed cing mchus bsnun
K12D0382_H0397:505b-14: pas chu bo'i mtshams byed do //
K12D0382_H0397:505b-15: rdo rje phyir bzlog pa'i don bka' stsal to //
K12D0382_H0397:505b-16: sbyin sreg ces bya ba la sogs pas ni dge ba byed pa'i phyir zhi ba dang /

K12D0382_H0397:506a-0: @506a *// las kun byed pa bzlas pas ni zhes bya ba ni h'um gis mngon par bsngags pa'o //

K12D0382_H0397:510b-0: @510b zhabs g-yas pas de bzhin du rdo rje skyil
K12D0382_H0397:510b-1: mo krung gi sbyor bas bud med thams cad ji
K12D0382_H0397:510b-3: brla g-yon pa bskyod bas de rnams dang mnyam bar sbyor bar bya'o //
K12D0382_H0397:510b-4: yang na zhal gyi phyag rgya bsgrags par bya ste /
K12D0382_H0397:510b-5: shar gyi re'u mig la ni dkar mo'i gdong zhi ba'o //
K12D0382_H0397:510b-6: g-yas su chom rkun ma'i gdong ni drag mo'o //
K12D0382_H0397:510b-7: rgyab tu rab tu rmongs ma'i ni bde ba'i myos byed kyis rab tu rmongs ma'i gdong ngo //
K12D0382_H0397:510b-8: g-yon du ro langs ma'i gdong ma'o //
K12D0382_H0397:510b-9: me'i re'u mig la pukka s'i ni gar gyi gdong ma'o //
K12D0382_H0397:510b-10: bden bral gyi re'u mig la ni gdol pa mo
K12D0382_H0397:510b-11: gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa'i sbyor bas thams cad du
K12D0382_H0397:510b-12: gus pa dang bcas pa'i gdong ma'o //
K12D0382_H0397:510b-13: rlung du ghasma r'i shi ba za ba'i gdong ma'o //
K12D0382_H0397:510b-14: dbang ldan du he ru ka lta bur bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs can ma'o //
K12D0382_H0397:510b-15: dkar mo ni zhi pa'i lta stangs so //
K12D0382_H0397:510b-16: chom rkun ma ni drag mo'i lta stangs so //
K12D0382_H0397:510b-17: rab tu rmongs ma ni rab tu rmongs pa'i lta stangs so //
K12D0382_H0397:510b-18: ro langs ma ni shi ba slong ba'i lta stangs so //
K12D0382_H0397:510b-19: pukka s'i ni gar gyi lta stangs so; ;gdol pa mo ni steng du lta ba'o //
K12D0382_H0397:510b-20: ghasma r'i ni gdan du lta ba'o //
K12D0382_H0397:510b-21: me tog la dkar mo'i gzugs su bsams nas /
K12D0382_H0397:510b-22: gang la byin pa de phyag rgyas 'debs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0382_H0397:510b-23: bdug pa la ni chom rkun ma'i gzugs so //
K12D0382_H0397:510b-24: chang la ni rab tu rmongs ma'i gzugs so //
K12D0382_H0397:510b-25: chu la ni ro langs ma'i gzugs so //
K12D0382_H0397:510b-26: shing gi 'khril shing zla ni pukka s'i'o //
K12D0382_H0397:511a-2: rtse gcig pa'i mnyam par sbyor ba'i bsam gtan gyi sbyor bas kun tu gnas so //
K12D0382_H0397:511a-3: de nas dkar mo de'i bsam gtan gyis kyang phyag rgyas gdab bar bya'o zhes sbyar ro //
K12D0382_H0397:511a-4: de ltar bya ba chom rkun mas snying ga nas
K12D0382_H0397:511a-5: drangs pa'i bsam gtan gyis bsgrub bya'i lus la zhugs
K12D0382_H0397:511a-7: rab tu rmongs pa'i sbyor bas bde bas rmongs shing bsgrub bya rmongs par bsam par bya ste /
K12D0382_H0397:511a-8: de ltar bde ba rab tu sbyin pas rab tu rmongs par byed pa'o //
K12D0382_H0397:511a-9: ro langs ma'i bsam gtan gyis bdud rtsi chu yis gtor bas shi ba slong bar byed do //
K12D0382_H0397:511a-10: pukka s'i'i rnal 'byor gyis se gol gtogs pas gar byed do //
K12D0382_H0397:511a-11: steng du shin tu dbugs kyi bsam gtan gyis lhan
K12D0382_H0397:511a-12: cig gcig tu gyur pas gdol pa mos gsod par
K12D0382_H0397:511a-13: byed do // gdan gyi bza' bas ghasma r'i'i bsam gtan des bza' bar bya'o //
K12D0382_H0397:511a-14: dkar mos ni g-yon gyi sta stangs kyis bsgrub bya la bltas pas phyag rgyas 'debs par byed do //
K12D0382_H0397:511a-15: yid kyis bsgrub bya'i snying gar zhugs te //
K12D0382_H0397:511a-16: de'i snying gi padma lag pa g-yon pas 'don cing 'gugs par byed do //
K12D0382_H0397:511a-17: chom rkun mas ni snying nas 'dren par byed do //
K12D0382_H0397:511a-18: rab tu rmongs mas ni yid kyis sam mngon sum du'o //
K12D0382_H0397:511a-19: byed pas bde bas rab tu rmongs par byed do //
K12D0382_H0397:511a-20: ro langs ma ni yid kyis sam /
K12D0382_H0397:511a-21: mngon sum du 'khyud nas 'chi ba slong bar byed do //
K12D0382_H0397:511b-0: @511b pukka s'i'i rnal 'byor gyis gar byed pa ni
K12D0382_H0397:511b-1: yi kyis bsgrub bya dang lhan cig gcig tu gyur
K12D0382_H0397:511b-2: pas rang gis gar byed do //
K12D0382_H0397:511b-3: yid kyis bsgrub bya dang lhan cig gcig tu gyur
K12D0382_H0397:511b-4: pas bde bas rmongs pa'i steng gi lta stangs byas
K12D0382_H0397:511b-5: te / gtum mo'i rnal 'byor gyis gsod par byed do //
K12D0382_H0397:511b-6: ghasma r'i'i rnal 'byor gyis bsgrub bya khar bcug ste bca' zhing bza' bar bya'o //
K12D0382_H0397:511b-7: bza' bar bya ba zhes bya ba ni dgra bo
K12D0382_H0397:511b-8: thams cad shin tu rtag tu zos pa zhes bya
K12D0382_H0397:511b-9: bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
K12D0382_H0397:511b-10: rdo rje h'um mdzad la ni 'jig rten gsum sgrol ba zhes bya ba'i ming rnyed par 'gyur te /
K12D0382_H0397:511b-11: de ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba yin no //
K12D0382_H0397:511b-12: de nas gzhan du zhes bya ba ni mdzes pa dang /
K12D0382_H0397:511b-13: snying rje'i stobs la sogs pa'i khro bo gzhan thams cad khro bo'i ro gcig par zhen pa'o //
K12D0382_H0397:511b-15: khro bo'i gzugs kyi mtshan ci lags /
K12D0382_H0397:511b-17: lus la dam par lta ba dang /
K12D0382_H0397:511b-19: gang zag la sogs pa bdag tu 'dzin pas smras pa dang /
K12D0382_H0397:511b-20: rtag pa thams cad kyi mthar byed pa gshin rje'i rgyal po ste /
K12D0382_H0397:511b-21: gsum byed pa de rnams kyis brtags pa'i 'khor lo
K12D0382_H0397:511b-22: las rgyal ba ni brtags pa thams cad kyi mchog
K12D0382_H0397:511b-23: dngos grub kyi dbang phyug yin no //
K12D0382_H0397:511b-24: khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje 'jigs byed ces bya ba bshad par bya ste /
K12D0382_H0397:511b-26: dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa nas bzung ste /
K12D0382_H0397:512a-1: thams cad rdo rje 'jigs byed kyis thal bar brlag par mdzad do //
K12D0382_H0397:512a-2: 'dod chags chen po zhes bya ba la 'dod chags chen po ni 'dod chags rdo rje ste /
K12D0382_H0397:512a-3: de'i ngo bo can ni der brjod pa yin no //
K12D0382_H0397:512a-4: yang rdo rje sems dpar gyur nas 'dod chags can
K12D0382_H0397:512a-5: gyi rdo rjer 'gyur pa'i phyir dpyid lta bur me
K12D0382_H0397:512a-6: tog dri zhim pa'i phreng ba dang /
K12D0382_H0397:512a-7: snying po la sogs pas brgyan par bya ba'i phyir dang /
K12D0382_H0397:512a-9: mda' dang ldan pa'i phyir nga ni 'dod pa'o //
K12D0382_H0397:512a-10: sku gsum gyi mda' ni rnam dgod pa zhes bya
K12D0382_H0397:512a-11: ba ni spang leb kyi phub kyi dbus su yum
K12D0382_H0397:512a-12: kham dang / aom la sogs pa gsum dgod pa dang /
K12D0382_H0397:512a-13: mda' dang lhan cig btsun mo'i spyi bor rdzas 'di
K12D0382_H0397:512a-14: rnams bsam par bya zhing 'dzag pa'i don du padma'i
K12D0382_H0397:512a-15: mthar gsungs so // gal te 'dod pa zhu ba ni 'dod pa zhu ba lta bu'o //
K12D0382_H0397:512a-16: padma zhes bya ba ni snying po te /
K12D0382_H0397:512a-17: ae bam lta bur dbang du gyur pas 'dzag pa'o //
K12D0382_H0397:512a-18: 'di skad la sogs mtha' yas mchog /
K12D0382_H0397:512a-19: sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa mchog ces bcom ldan
K12D0382_H0397:512a-20: 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang
K12D0382_H0397:512a-22: thugs kyi rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal to //
K12D0382_H0397:512a-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /
K12D0382_H0397:512a-24: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na
K12D0382_H0397:512a-25: rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
K12D0382_H0397:512a-26: to // nyid kyi 'byung ba yang dag par bka' stsal la /
K12D0382_H0397:512b-0: da ni bdag la bshad du @512b gsol /
K12D0382_H0397:512b-1: sna tshogs bris sku bkab pa zhes bya ba ni gdan rnams su brjod de /
K12D0382_H0397:512b-2: de rnams kyi yar 'jug pa ni de'i don gyi rnal 'byor te /
K12D0382_H0397:512b-4: de bas na rang 'byung bar byed do /
K12D0382_H0397:512b-5: yang dag par rab tu gsungs pa zhes bya ba ni bskyed do zhes bya ba'i don to //
K12D0382_H0397:512b-6: padma'i snod ces bya ba 'di ni mi'i thod par shes par bya'o //
K12D0382_H0397:512b-7: nga ni yang khyod la btsun mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbyibs bshad par bya ste /
K12D0382_H0397:512b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang ni zlum po'o //
K12D0382_H0397:512b-9: he ru ka'i zla ba phyed pa'i dbyibs zhes bya
K12D0382_H0397:512b-10: ba ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbyibs zhes bya
K12D0382_H0397:512b-11: ba'i don to // padma'i rnam pa dang /
K12D0382_H0397:512b-12: rin po che'i rnam par shes par bya'o //
K12D0382_H0397:512b-13: ji ltar 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni ji ltar 'dun pa'o //
K12D0382_H0397:512b-14: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
K12D0382_H0397:512b-18: ral gri'i gdan gyi dbus su sgrub pa po gang
K12D0382_H0397:512b-19: 'dod pa de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs
K12D0382_H0397:512b-21: phyi nas rta mchog gi gzugs brnyan gzhug par bya ste /
K12D0382_H0397:512b-22: rta mchog gi dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa yin no //
K12D0382_H0397:512b-23: ji ltar thob pa zhes bya ba ni ji ltar rnyed pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
K12D0382_H0397:512b-24: gang nyid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi yo byed skyes pa de nyid kyi yo byad kyis bri bar bya'o //
K12D0382_H0397:512b-25: dus ji lta bar zhes bya ba ni zhi bar
K12D0382_H0397:512b-26: 'dod pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus
K12D0382_H0397:512b-27: su gdan de bri bar bya'o //
K12D0382_H0397:513a-0: rgyas pa'i don du rin po che'i dkyil 'khor la @513a *//
K12D0382_H0397:513a-1: nyi ma shar na bri bar bya'o //
K12D0382_H0397:513a-2: mngon spyod kyi las rnams la nyi ma phyed dang /
K12D0382_H0397:513a-3: nam phyed na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la'o //
K12D0382_H0397:513a-4: gzhan pa'i las rnams la padma'i dkyil 'khor la nyi ma smyur na'o //
K12D0382_H0397:513a-5: ji ltar bde ba zhes bya ba ni dam tshig dang /
K12D0382_H0397:513a-6: dbang la dus kyi nges pa yod pa ma yin no //
K12D0382_H0397:513a-10: nub kyi phyogs su thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad du'o //
K12D0382_H0397:513a-11: yongs su gang ba'i dbang zhes bya ba ni slob dpon thams cad do //
K12D0382_H0397:513a-12: slob ma mchog 'bring tham kun zhes bya ba ni tha ma la ni dkyil 'khor gyi dbang dang /
K12D0382_H0397:513a-14: 'bring po la ni nya phyis kyis so //
K12D0382_H0397:513a-15: gang zhig mchog de rnams la ni sangs rgyas gcig pu'i bdag nyid kyis sbyin par bya'o //
K12D0382_H0397:513a-16: dum bu gcig pa'i mgo skyes zhes bya ba ni dum bu gcig pa dang /
K12D0382_H0397:513a-17: mgo bo'i rdo rje ni dum bu gcig pa'i mgo skyes so //
K12D0382_H0397:513a-18: dum bu gcig pa ni thod pa dum bu gcig pa'i bdag nyid kyis dbang yang bya'o //
K12D0382_H0397:513a-19: mgo skyes zhes bya ba ni padma'i snod do //
K12D0382_H0397:513a-20: dum bu gcig pa ni bug pa gcig pa ste /
K12D0382_H0397:513a-22: ma chag pa zhes bya ba ji snyed pa rtogs par bya'o //
K12D0382_H0397:513a-23: kam ni phung po skyong bar byed pa'i phyir thod pa'o //
K12D0382_H0397:513a-25: sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'grub //
K12D0382_H0397:513a-26: padma gcig bdag de bzhin no //
K12D0382_H0397:513a-27: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rdo rje rin po che'i dbang ngo //
K12D0382_H0397:513a-28: dpal he ru ka ni rdo rje'i dbang ngo //
K12D0382_H0397:513b-0: 'od dpag tu med @513b pa'i dbang ni nor bu'i dbang dang /
K12D0382_H0397:513b-2: rin po che phyed pa ni rdo rje'i dbang ngo //
K12D0382_H0397:513b-3: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku ni nor bu'i dbang du shes par bya'o //
K12D0382_H0397:513b-6: 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gyis mi bskyod pa ni rdo rje sems dpar yang shes par bya'o //
K12D0382_H0397:513b-7: thod pa'i gdan 'di'i 'bad pas bsgrub par bya ba gang zhe na /
K12D0382_H0397:513b-8: rang bzhin nyid de'i 'grub pa rab tu 'byung bas
K12D0382_H0397:513b-9: rang bzhin las rab tu 'byung ba'i nus pas gzung
K12D0382_H0397:513b-10: ba dang / 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa skabs
K12D0382_H0397:513b-11: med pa'i ngo bo'i phyir de nyid du gyur pa'i
K12D0382_H0397:513b-12: rab tu byung bas de'i rang bzhin gyis grub pa'o
K12D0382_H0397:513b-13: ba dang / // thod pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan gyi
K12D0382_H0397:513b-14: gzugs kyi rang bzhin las zhes bya ba ni gnyis
K12D0382_H0397:513b-15: su med pa'i ye shes las de ltar gsungs pa
K12D0382_H0397:513b-16: ba dang / // yin no // dper na /
K12D0382_H0397:513b-17: me ni tsha ba'i rang bzhin du grub pa ste /
K12D0382_H0397:513b-18: de ltar de'i yang rab tu 'byung ba nyid las
K12D0382_H0397:513b-19: rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i phyir de nyid kyi
K12D0382_H0397:513b-20: bzang po'i bsam pa'i rnal 'byor byas na ye shes
K12D0382_H0397:513b-21: sems dpa' dang lhan cig gcig pa'i dngos pos de
K12D0382_H0397:513b-22: ltar gyur pa'i rnal 'byor gyis de bzhin gshegs pa
K12D0382_H0397:513b-23: thams cad kyi rtogs par bya'o //
K12D0382_H0397:513b-24: rang gi snying ga'i zla bar h'um blos bris nas de brjod par bya ste /
K12D0382_H0397:513b-25: bdag nyid nam mkha' dang mnyam par bsam par bya'o //
K12D0382_H0397:513b-26: de nyid kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid do //
K12D0382_H0397:513b-27: de'i steng du rdo rje rtse lnga par h'um yang sgom mo //
K12D0382_H0397:514a-1: pa thams cad bcug cing der yang rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed nas bkug ste /
K12D0382_H0397:514a-2: padma'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol ba dang /
K12D0382_H0397:514a-3: ji ltar spyan ma la sogs pa'i sprul par yang bzhugs par bya'o //
K12D0382_H0397:514a-5: de ltar rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i yang
K12D0382_H0397:514a-6: rang gi rigs kyi 'byung ba'i sbyor ba blta bar
K12D0382_H0397:514a-7: bya ste / 'dis ni yang rab tu sbyor bas
K12D0382_H0397:514a-8: gang zhig de rnams skye ba de ni nyi ma
K12D0382_H0397:514a-9: bya ste / dang / zla ba 'byung ba lta bu'o //
K12D0382_H0397:514a-11: nang gi bdag nyid las yi ge lngar 'gyur ba'i
K12D0382_H0397:514a-12: phyir lha mo thams cad gnyis las skyes pa dang
K12D0382_H0397:514a-13: rdzogs pa'o // las thams cad rab tu rgyas par 'byung ba'i cho ga'o //
K12D0382_H0397:514a-14: la la zhes bya ba ni ma mthong ba'o //
K12D0382_H0397:514a-15: rang gi sems so sor rtog pa'i phyir byang chub kyi sems so //
K12D0382_H0397:514a-16: byang chub tu btab pa'i sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'o //
K12D0382_H0397:514a-17: de'i spyod pa ni byang chub kyi spyod pa ste /
K12D0382_H0397:514a-18: ji ltar sems dpa' yang dag par rnyed nas rjes su 'brangs pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba'o //
K12D0382_H0397:514a-21: don thams cad grub par byed pa'i ming po gsum gyi gzugs kyis gnas pa'i tshul gyis dang /
K12D0382_H0397:514a-22: sems can gyi don byed de /
K12D0382_H0397:514a-23: de nyid sna tshogs kyi rnam par 'gyur zhing /
K12D0382_H0397:514a-26: snying stobs kyang sems can gyi don du 'gyur te /
K12D0382_H0397:514a-27: gang zhig rnam par dag pa de ni kun tu bzang po'o //
K12D0382_H0397:514b-0: de bas na byang chub kyi @514b spyod pa 'di
K12D0382_H0397:514b-1: ni ji ltar rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ba
K12D0382_H0397:514b-3: kha ba nas gsal bar 'byung ba'am zhes bya ba
K12D0382_H0397:514b-4: ni sems can gyi don du skyes bu chen po'i
K12D0382_H0397:514b-5: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
K12D0382_H0397:514b-6: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu rdzogs pa ste /
K12D0382_H0397:514b-7: bsod nams kyi phung po de'i nyi zer gyi rdul
K12D0382_H0397:514b-8: ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
K12D0382_H0397:514b-9: rnams so // de rnams kyi rdul ni dpe byad bzang po rnams so //
K12D0382_H0397:514b-10: gsal bar gyur pa de gang zhe na /
K12D0382_H0397:514b-11: gsal ba ni khyad par du yon tan la sogs pa 'dzin ste /
K12D0382_H0397:514b-12: byang chub chen po'i mchod pa ni de rnams kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba'o //
K12D0382_H0397:514b-13: bdud kyi gzugs kyis byang chub sems dpa' slu ba ni skyes pa'i bdud de /
K12D0382_H0397:514b-15: rang byang chub kyi sems gsod pa'i phyir bdud ni 'dod chags rdo rje'o //
K12D0382_H0397:514b-16: bdud bzhi bcom pa dang ldan zhing bdud las rgyal
K12D0382_H0397:514b-17: bar kha cig tu sh'akya thub par gyur pas mngon
K12D0382_H0397:514b-18: par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
K12D0382_H0397:514b-20: gang zag tu 'dzin pa tshar bcad pa'i phyir thar pa rnam par dag pa'o //
K12D0382_H0397:514b-21: 'jig rten pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i gang zag tshar bcad pa'i phyir dang /
K12D0382_H0397:514b-23: rang sangs rgyas kyi chos su 'dzin pa tshar bcad pa'i phyir de ltar chos dang /
K12D0382_H0397:514b-24: gang zag la bdag med par rtogs nas ji ltar
K12D0382_H0397:514b-25: gyur pa yongs su shes pa'i phyir thar pa thams
K12D0382_H0397:514b-26: cad rnam par dag pa yin te /
K12D0382_H0397:514b-27: 'di'i don du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mdzad pa'o //
K12D0382_H0397:515a-2: rnam pa drug cu rtsa gnyis dang /
K12D0382_H0397:515a-3: 'dod chags rnam pa thams cad dang /
K12D0382_H0397:515a-4: de'i rnam par dag ba ste /
K12D0382_H0397:515a-5: de kho na la bdag mi dmigs pas rang bzhin med pa'i phyir de'i don /

K12D0382_H0397:519b-6: bzhin 'od gsal ba'i phyir de ji ltar na nyon
K12D0382_H0397:519b-7: mongs pa yang ma yin zhing ma dag pa yang
K12D0382_H0397:519b-8: ma yin no // nyon mongs pa glo bur gyi
K12D0382_H0397:519b-9: phyir ji ltar nyon mongs pa can ma yin zhing
K12D0382_H0397:519b-11: de ltar stong pa nyid kyi rab tu dbye ba gsungs so //
K12D0382_H0397:519b-12: de la stong pa nyid kyi mdor bsdus pa'i don sgrub pa yin no //
K12D0382_H0397:519b-13: yang gsungs pa; 'dod chags kyi gnyen por mi sdug pa la sogs pa dang /
K12D0382_H0397:519b-14: zhe sdang gi gnyen por byams pa dang /
K12D0382_H0397:519b-15: gti mug gi gnyen por rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o //
K12D0382_H0397:519b-16: de la ji ltar 'dod chags rnam par ldog ce na /
K12D0382_H0397:519b-17: gal te de dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
K12D0382_H0397:519b-18: yin mod kyi gang zhig de skad du 'dod chags
K12D0382_H0397:519b-19: kyi bdag nyid du byed pa na 'dod chags dang
K12D0382_H0397:519b-20: bral ba yin no; ;de bzhin du gsungs pa /
K12D0382_H0397:519b-24: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'dod chags kyi ye shes ni rnyog pa med pa ste /
K12D0382_H0397:519b-25: 'dod chags kyis 'dod chags dang bral ba bcom nas bde ba thams cad sbyin par byed do //
K12D0382_H0397:519b-26: 'dod chags la sogs pa ni rang bzhin gyis kha
K12D0382_H0397:519b-27: na ma tho ba med pa dang bcas pa ste
K12D0382_H0397:520a-1: pa'i 'dod chags rnyed pa yin na de'i 'dod chags
K12D0382_H0397:520a-2: la sogs pa yongs su mi spong bar spyod na
K12D0382_H0397:520a-3: / 'on te rim pa'i khyad par las yon tan gyi khyad par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0382_H0397:520a-4: dper na ke ta ka'i me tog dri'i glang po
K12D0382_H0397:520a-5: ches zos na gla rtsi la sogs pa'i dngos por
K12D0382_H0397:520a-6: 'gyur ro // glang po che phal pas zos na
K12D0382_H0397:520a-7: lci ba'i dngos por 'gyur ro; ;de bas na de
K12D0382_H0397:520a-8: la ko ta ka'i me tog gi skyon ma yin
K12D0382_H0397:520a-9: 'gyur ro // te / de bzhin du 'dod chags
K12D0382_H0397:520a-10: la sogs pa yang rnam par dag pa'i rim pa
K12D0382_H0397:520a-11: la gnas pas bsam pa'i khyad par gyi sbyor ba
K12D0382_H0397:520a-12: las khyad par du 'phags pa nyid kyi 'bras bu
K12D0382_H0397:520a-15: 'o ma sprul la sogs pas 'thungs na dug gi dngos por 'gyur ro //
K12D0382_H0397:520a-17: skyes bus 'thungs na bdud rtsi'i dngos por skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0382_H0397:520a-20: 'dod chags la sogs pa bsam pa'i khyad par gyis
K12D0382_H0397:520a-21: rang bzhin gyis kha na ma tho ba med pa'i
K12D0382_H0397:520a-22: phyir sbyor bas dngos po khyad par can gyi 'bras
K12D0382_H0397:520a-25: gang khyad par du 'phags pa'i rgyun gyi dngos po dang ldan pa de dang /
K12D0382_H0397:520a-26: de'i 'bras bu khyad du 'phags pa 'byung ngo //
K12D0382_H0397:520a-28: ke ta ka la sogs pa de rnams kyi khyad par du 'phags pa'i rim pa la gnas pa /
K12D0382_H0397:520b-0: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rnam par @520b dag pa'o //
K12D0382_H0397:520b-1: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal yang dag par sbyor ba'i thig le zhes bya ba rdzogs so ////
K12D0382_H0397:520b-2: rgya gar gyi mkhan po k'a ya stha pa ga ya dha ra'i zhal snga nas dang /
K12D0382_H0397:520b-3: bod kyi lotstsha ba dge slong sh'akya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa /
K12D0382_H0397:520b-4: slad nas kyang bod kyi lotstsha ba gzhan rnams kyis
K12D0382_H0397:520b-5: bsgyur ba la zur mi 'dra bar bcos nas rang
K12D0382_H0397:520b-7: gzhan gyi ming 'phyi pa de dag dang /
K12D0382_H0397:520b-8: mi shes pa de dag sun dbyung ba'i phyir slad nas byang rgya gar gyi rgyud bzhi dang //
